Title: Testo Flue gas analyser 327-1 advanced kit
Description: Simply designed and easy to operate, the Testo 327-1 flue gas analyser advanced kit is an entry level option designed for use in domestic boilers. Durably and ergonomically designed, with a robust housing that will stand up to knocks, this analyser is suitable for measuring O2, CO and CO2 as well as for calculating ratio. Fully configurable to suit the engineer's needs, 327-1 has a backlit four line LED display and simple to navigate menu system. This kit is supplied with a differential temperature kit and pressure hose connection kit as well as a printer and carry case, shoulder strap and power supply.

Title: Testo flue gas analyser kit with no sensor
Description: Offering a wide range of features for improved reliability, accuracy and efficiency, the Testo 300 flue gas analyser with long life sensors is ideal for those engineers carrying out analysis tasks day in, day out. Providing easy measurement of flue gas, draught, pressure, ambient CO and differential temperature, this handy all-in-one kit includes a factory-fitted NO sensor for NOx measurement and the option to carry out draught and gas zeroing without probe removal. The 300's high quality sensors are paired with Smart-Touch technology for intuitive operation. In addition, this clever tool allows for the simplified documentation and e-mailing of reports, making record-keeping easier.

Title: Testo digital manometer kit
Description: This Testo 510 digital manometer kit includes a differential pressure measuring instrument for use on gas hot water heaters or air conditioning systems and for flow measurements in ventilation ducts using a Pitot tube. Compact in design, the Testo 510 has a silicone connection hose and a range of other useful accessories for the maintenance and installation of systems in the sanitary and HVAC sectors.

Title: Testo 760-2 TRMS multi-meter
Description: Used to make all of the most vital current, voltage and resistance readings, the Testo 760-2 digital multimeter enables the automatic detection of parameters through the assignment of sockets. This minimises the risk of expensive and dangerous user errors while also saving time on making adjustments before taking readings. Doing away with the traditional dial in favour of function keys and a large, illuminated display, the modern 760-2 is a user-friendly device suitable for quick readings and one-handed use. With a wide measuring range, this clever multimeter is capable of measuring current strength in the µA range as well as temperatures. An integrated low-pass filter provides accurate measurement on frequency converter controlled motors.
category: Trade Essentials/Test Equipment and Detection/Flue Gas Analysers/Flue Gas Analysers.csv -> Testo 760-2 TRMS multi-meter

Title: Anton Sprint bluetooth gas analyser
Description: Designed to analyse CO:CO2 ratios, the Anton Sprint Pro 3 Bluetooth multifunction flue gas analyser is also capable of performing CO sweep tests and CO ambient air monitoring. A hardwearing tool with a probe that clicks into place for secure working, this analyser is well protected from condensation and dust ingress thanks to an inbuilt condensation trap with water stop technology and a particulate filter. Allowing for over-range protection, the Sprint Pro 3 is an ideal choice for oil and commissioning engineers and plumbers, providing the capacity for upgrades to suit an everchanging industry and supplying the tools required by those working in BS 7967:2015.
category: Trade Essentials/Test Equipment and Detection/Flue Gas Analysers/Flue Gas Analysers.csv -> Anton Sprint bluetooth gas analyser

Title: Testo 760-3 TRMS multi-meter
Description: A reliable choice for electrical professionals, the Testo 760-3 digital multimeter carries out both basic and complex electrical measurement tasks, automatically choosing the appropriate measurement parameters using socket assignment to minimise the risk of costly mistakes. With a voltage range of up to 1000V, capacitance of up to 60,000µF and a frequency range of up to 30MHz, the 760-3 allows for the troubleshooting of large industrial electrical systems. Providing accurate results on frequency converter controlled motors, this smart multimeter uses an integrated low-pass filter and has a clip-on K-type thermocouple adapter and temperature probe for the additional convenience of thermometer operation.
